links.title: Tesla Inc (TSLA) Offers The Most Safety Features Of Any Car Brands
links.description: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) offers more safety features - including autonomous driving ones - than any other auto brand, according to researchers at Edmunds. The car shopping research company publisher their latest safety report this week, and Bloomberg has the details: Volvo Cars and Honda Motor Co.

messages.body: Think #Tesla is in the lead on autonomous cars? Think again. $GM $F $TSLA $GOOGL https://investorplace.com/2017/10/surprise-general-motors-company-stock-is-the-top-self-driving-car-pick/

links.title: Surprise! General Motors Company Stock is The Top Self-Driving Car Pick
links.description: James Brumley, InvestorPlace Feature Writer The autonomous car war is not only heating up, but it's also getting messy. Most recently, General Motors Company (NYSE:) has entered discussions with ride-sharing service Uber... an interesting move, considering it wasn't that long ago the carmaker told GM stock owners it was investing half a billion dollars in Uber's rival Lyft to help advance its self-driving vehicle ambitions.
